channel.title: Problem(bluurrs client)
channel.description: when i run the client it run for like 5 secs then automatically closes...wats wrong?

item.title: Problem(bluurrs client)
item.dc:creator: @princess101 princess101
item.description:
@princess101 wrote:

yes it hink i know wats ur problme. is.

ur problme got missed in java. when u try to runserver or open client or any its not work and if u try to download anew game not work i think u have a good away to slove this problme. u must go to reinstall all java u got and if u get an error when install “error fatal when install” u will need to remove it fro regi… but its bad for ur comp if ur lucky maybe work.

well
step1: click at start at ur left down then choise run then put in it regedit
step2:now u log in regi in ur comp then u need to remove all java click f3 then search for java then keep search and delete
step3:then and when u finshed to delte all YOU MUST DELETE ALL!!! OR NOT WORK.
step4:go to WwW.Google.Com then search for uninstaller 2008 then select the frist one then download it
step5:install it then ope it then search for java then click unisntall tehn now u dont have any java file on ur pc … then go to www.java.com then download jdk frist. 6u7 if u wanna to code then it will ask u to dl the normal java …i think this is easy way to get a good java jdk frist then normal one i hope u understand anything lol… its the one way …
if u need any help in java++ pm me okey… . hope worked
